info.title: Tariff Plan
info.description:
Using this Tariff Plan API, telecom data, recharge plans API, you can find out all the latest plans info of various telecom operators around India.
Keywords: Recharge Plans API, Recharge API, Mobile Recharge API, Mobile recharge info, recharge plans, telecom data, online recharge API, tariff plan of bsnl,  tariff plans of airtel, tariff plan of aircel, tariff plan of vodafone, tariff plans of tata docomo, tariff plans of reliance, tariff plan of reliance gsm, tariff plan bsnl up east, tariff plan app,tariff plan comparison india, tariff plan comparison

get.description: Get the latest recharge Plans Info    Note: This API is only a demo version of the service which we provide.

parameters.name: circleid
parameters.description: Telecom  circle Name. Supported List: MAHARASHTRA, KERALA, UP WEST, RAJASTHAN, BIHAR JHARKHAND, CHENNAI, GUJARAT, HARYANA, HIMACHAL PRADESH, MUMBAI, ORISSA, PUNJAB, TAMIL NADU, UP EAST, WEST BENGAL, ANDHRA PRADESH, KARNATAKA, DELHI NCR, KOLKATA, ASSAM, MADHYA PRADESH CHHATTISGARH, NORTH EAST, JAMMU KASHMIR, UP WEST AND UTTARAKHAND

parameters.name: operatorid
parameters.description: Enter the Telecom Operator Name. Supported List : BSNL, IDEA, AIRTEL, AIRCEL, VIDEOCON, VODAFONE, LOOP MOBILE, MTS, VIRGIN GSM, VIRGIN CDMA, T24, RELIANCE CDMA, TATA INDICOM, UNINOR, RELIANCE GSM, MTNL, TATA DOCOMO GSM

parameters.name: recharge_type
parameters.description: Recharge Type. Supported Values: full, top, special, 2g, 3g, roaming
